dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.tagline: Realtime overview of your users, usage, and service status.

users.title: Users
users.subtitle: Manage your VPN users and subscriptions
users.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
users.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
users.myanmarPriorityPreviewBody: Review current and new fallback order before applying.
users.qualityAutoTunePreviewBody: Reorder keys based on recent connect success, rejects, and reconnects.
users.bulkQualityPreviewBody: Reorder selected users by recent connect success, rejects, and reconnects.

devices.title: Devices
devices.noneRecent: No devices tracked in the last {{minutes}} minutes.
devices.revokeDescription: Revoke this device? It will need to reconnect.

actions.rotateDescription: Rotate UUID, password, and subscription token. Old configs will stop working.
actions.revokeDescription: Disable the user's keys immediately (clients will disconnect).
actions.regenerateDescription: Regenerate the subscription token. Old subscription links will stop working.
actions.disconnectDescription: Disconnect active sessions for this user.
actions.disableDescription: Disable this user. They will not be able to connect.

bulk.extendExpiryDescription: Add days to the expiry date.
bulk.applyStatusDescription: Apply the selected status to all selected users.
bulk.rotateDescription: Old configs will stop working for the rotated users.
bulk.revokeDescription: Disable keys immediately for the selected users.
bulk.assignDescription: Add selected users to the chosen group.
bulk.removeDescription: Remove selected users from the chosen group.
bulk.moveDescription: Move selected users to the chosen group.
bulk.applyPolicyTitle: Apply group policy to selected users
bulk.applyPolicyDescription: Apply current group policy settings to selected users.

views.saveDescription: Save current filters as a view.

form.noInboundsHint: No inbounds available. Create one first.
form.startOnFirstUseDescription: The expiry timer begins when the user first connects (downloads subscription). Until then, the account stays active.

quickEdit.title: Quick Edit
quickEdit.helper: Expiry is stored as days from now. We convert this date automatically when saving.

bulkCreate.title: Bulk User Provisioning
bulkCreate.subtitle: Create multiple users with consistent limits and inbound assignments.

bulkCreate.notePlaceholder: Optional note applied to all created users

toast.failedBody: Failed to create users in bulk

toast.bulkRevokeFailed: Failed to revoke access for selected users.

confirm.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this user? This action cannot be undone.

effectiveInbounds.title: Effective inbound access
effectiveInbounds.subtitle: Combined view of direct assignments and inherited group mappings.
effectiveInbounds.empty: No effective inbounds found for this user.

policy.title: Effective policy
policy.subtitle: Compare direct user policy with inherited group policy overrides.
policy.unavailable: Effective policy is unavailable for this user.

keys.title: Access keys
keys.subtitle: Manage per-inbound keys, status, online visibility, and client templates.
keys.empty: No keys match the selected filter.
keys.dragHintEnabled: Drag rows from the Menu column to reorder key priority. The order controls subscription fallback.
keys.dragHintDisabled: Enable drag reorder by setting Filter: All keys and Sort: Priority ascending.
keys.dragHandleDisabled: Sort by priority ascending to enable drag reorder

toast.noKeyUrl: No key URL available for this inbound
toast.noKeys: No keys available for this user.

toast.myanmarPreviewFailed: Failed to preview Myanmar priority order
toast.myanmarApplyFailed: Failed to apply Myanmar priority order
toast.noTelemetry: No recent connections were detected. Generate traffic on at least one key and try again.

groups.title: Groups
groups.subtitle: Reusable policy templates, schedules, and rollout history.
groups.searchPlaceholder: Search groups by name or remark
groups.emptyBody: Create your first group to reuse user/inbound assignments.

toast.refreshedBody: Groups, templates, schedules, and rollouts are up to date.

confirmDelete.body: Delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

editor.subtitle: Reusable user, inbound and policy bundle.
editor.policyOverridesHint: Leave empty to inherit each user policy.

templates.searchPlaceholder: Search templates by name or description
templates.emptyBody: Create your first reusable policy template.

editor.subtitle: Reusable policy overrides for multiple groups.

applyModal.title: Apply Template: {{name}}
applyModal.subtitle: Copy template policy into a target group.
applyModal.applyNow: Run policy rollout immediately after template apply

schedules.emptyBody: Create a recurring rollout schedule for any group.

rollouts.emptyBody: Manual or scheduled policy applications will appear here.

inbounds.subtitle: Manage your Xray inbound configurations and reusable profiles.

cdn.hint: Traffic profiles optimized for edge/CDN transport.

transport.title: Transport Profiles
transport.hint: Focused presets for specific transport behaviors.

utility.hint: DNS forwarders, gateways, and service adapters.

inbounds.bulkDeleteBody: Delete {{count}} inbound(s)? This action cannot be undone.
inbounds.deleteBody: Delete inbound "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

import.noValidProfilesBody: No valid inbound profiles found in selected file.

myanmarPack.title: Apply Myanmar Resilience Pack
myanmarPack.subtitle: Create a curated fallback set (REALITY + WS/TLS) for high-censorship environments.
myanmarPack.assignUsersHint: Choose which users should receive the pack after creation.
myanmarPack.assignGroupsHint: Choose which groups should receive the pack after creation.
myanmarPack.previewWarningsTitle: Myanmar pack preview generated with warnings

systemHealth.title: System Health
systemHealth.errorBody: Could not reach backend health endpoint. Confirm `backend` is running on port `3000`.

unlockConfirm.default: Force unlock the active Xray update lock?
unlockConfirm.withOwner: Force unlock active update lock owned by {{owner}} (expires {{expiresAt}})?

body.restricted: Update tooling is available for ADMIN and SUPER_ADMIN roles.
body.scriptedDisabled: Runtime mode is {{mode}}. Scripted container update actions are disabled.
body.ready: All required checks passed. You can run canary/full rollout safely.
body.locked: Xray update lock is active. Resolve lock state before running updates.
body.blockingFailure: One or more required checks are failing. Apply fixes before rollout.

toast.copyFailedBody: Failed to copy preflight fix commands.

issue.noteBody: This will issue a wildcard certificate for *.yourdomain.com using Cloudflare DNS validation. Make sure your domain nameservers point to Cloudflare.

bot.helpTitle: How to get your Chat ID

bot.helpStep3: 3. Add it to the field above

toast.linked: Telegram account linked to current admin.
toast.unlinked: Telegram account unlinked from current admin.

manual.title: Manual backup
manual.body: Create a full backup of your database, SSL certificates, and configuration files.

dns.subtitle: Quickly add or update DNS records in your Cloudflare account.

cdnScan.subtitle: Scan for the best performing Cloudflare IPs for your location. This helps optimize speed and latency.

channels.title: Notification channels
channels.webhookSecretKeepLabel: Webhook secret (leave blank to keep existing)

errors.routesMustBeObject: Routes JSON must be an object
